This Website prvides the data for the graphs that were presented in the Poster at the EGU General Assembly 2019,
session BG2.12 - Constraining present and future global vegetation dynamics and carbon stocks.

The poster title is _Improving understanding of wood formation: a comparison of two models_

The Abstract can be found here: [https://meetingorganizer.copernicus.org/EGU2019/EGU2019-17876.pdf]
